entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Showers beginning in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
